fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e1.equipments.hem

Class IndoorGardenConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e1.equipments.hem.IndoorGardenConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.ConnectorI, PlanningEquipmentControlCI, StandardEquipmentControlCI, SuspensionAndPlanningEquipmentControlCI, SuspensionEquipmentControlCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI

    public class IndoorGardenConnector
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
implements SuspensionAndPlanningEquipmentControlCI
    The class IndoorGardenConnector implements a connector that bridges the gap between the required component interface SuspensionAndPlanningEquipmentControlCI and the offered component interface IndoorGardenCI.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariants

    Created on : 2022-09-16

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
